A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was extremely disappointed with The Force Awakens.  I'd seen it all before.  It wasn't a sequel or even a new movie.  No\, it was a rewrite of A New Hope.  I was bored.  It was completely predictable.\nThe Last Jedi changed that.  It was fresh.  It was exciting.  It had twists and turns.  It brought back the humor.  It was a great movie and I'm glad that Rian Johnson didn't write a fan fiction piece\, which is what The Force Awakens felt like.
